subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The rookie linebacker Devonte Holloman returned a tipped pass 75 yards for a touchdown Sunday night to spark the Dallas Cowboys to a 24-20 victory over the Miami Dolphins in the Hall of Fame game in Canton, Ohio.
snippet: The rookie linebacker Devonte Holloman returned a tipped pass 75 yards for a touchdown Sunday night to spark the Dallas Cowboys to a 24-20 victory over the Miami Dolphins in the Hall of Fame game in Canton, Ohio.
